Content.Text:
<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Zzzz... what are you doing... stop
that.... zzzz....

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hey... cut it out... don't be... be so
horrible...
Maybe I should wake her up?
I'll wake her
I'll just leave quietly

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Uwaaah!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You really surprised me! I even cast
some magic!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Why did you wake me up?
I wanted to surprise you
Say nothing

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You disturbed my sleep for that?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Are you ready for the consequences?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Of course you are! Eat a lovely slice of
payback!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
No more pranks, okay?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Or do you want another jolt?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Okay. I want to go back to sleep. Can
you leave please?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
That dream worked me up into a nasty
sweat.
<PAGE>
That's all in the past now. It doesn't
matter any more.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What's wrong? Why don't you speak up?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Was I having a bad dream?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I see... that's why you woke me up.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You haven't asked anything about this,
either, have you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. You've proven
yourself to be quite mature.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, don't worry about that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm very glad we met, <MYNAME>.
I love you!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Heh heh, I have to say nice things to
you every now and then!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm going to go back to sleep, anyway.
I think I'll sleep peacefully this time.
Come again soon, okay?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Coming to this town was definitely the
right choice!
